1.content:
Person in the shadow of the door had realy deep voice saying..... ,,Hey .."
Josh replied : ,,Hi "
When that person came inside the room, Josh recognized that it was.....
1.title: Who is that ?

info.brief_description: (this story should by male only and should stick to the growing/shrinking scenario)
info.description: It was late Friday evening and Josh was dressing off in the locker´s after his cardio training, so he was pretty much sweaty. (Josh https://sportsgaylovegrowth3.tumblr.com/image/185177422537 ). Usualy at this time he used to be alone in the gym (gym was owned by a good friend of his so josh had his own keys), but not this time... The door to the locker´s has opened and when Josh turned around in the door was standing.....
